name: Hardcore OG
description: An indica-dominant cross between Big Bud and DJ Short Blueberry, Hardcore OG is a California strain bred with the stalwart cannabis veteran in mind. Its dense, pungent buds produce thick coats of resin that can be extracted for potent (and we mean potent) concentrates. The weight of this sedating indica sinks throughout the body, submerging stress, pain, and other ailments under its crushing THC content.
descriptionPlain: An indica-dominant cross between Big Bud and DJ Short Blueberry, Hardcore OG is a California strain bred with the stalwart cannabis veteran in mind. Its dense, pungent buds produce thick coats of resin that can be extracted for potent (and we mean potent) concentrates. The weight of this sedating indica sinks throughout the body, submerging stress, pain, and other ailments under its crushing THC content.

highlightedReviews.text:
Tonight's adventure with a concentrate of Hardcore OG has me completely and amazingly impaired.

I saw the flower on sale for insulting prices here in SF, so I got curious about what made it so special. I love Indica too, so I decided to scratch the itch.

After doing some research,  I found a cult that worshiped tonight's concentrate which is supposed to be able to cripple a  rhino: rhino down. I feel like a happy little kid that got hit in the head by a line drive. Now what was I just doing? Oh yeah, experiencing the most intense body buzz that I have EVER felt. Everything is tingling, even my disco stick. 

Do your self a favor and try this. In terms of medicinal effect; I'd use this for stress and a burst of creativity. I'm gonna go listen to some music.
Great night sleep medicine. Concentrate from Cal. Comes in with a relaxing transition to bed. Not recommended for daytime use. Overall tasty & relaxing.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Strawberry Blue, Blackberry Haze, Sugar Punch, Pineapple Skunk, and Hardcore OG
articles.author: Anna Wilcox
articles.text:
Summer may be over, but that doesn't mean an end to fun and fruity summertime flavors. This week's strain alert is packed with some extra tasty treats. From Strawberry Blue to Sugar Punch, these gems all feature incredibly unique and full-bodied aromas, perfect for sneaking in one last taste of those fresh summer flavors. 
Visit the Leafly strain Explorer to write a review or find one of these delicious buds near you!
1. Strawberry Blue
Characteristics of Strawberry Blue:

75/25 sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Strawberry and New Blue
Bred by World of Seeds
Sweet, fruity aroma
Delivers head-heavy, cerebral effects
Indoor and outdoor flowering time of 9 weeks

2. Blackberry Haze
Characteristics of Blackberry Haze:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Blackberry and Lime Haze
Bred by Nebu Hybridz
Sweet, berry aroma with hints of violet, spice, and cocoa
Brings focused and energetic effects

3. Sugar Punch
Characteristics of Sugar Punch:

Slightly sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross of Super Silver Haze and The One
Bred by Sannie Seeds
Berry and lemon aroma
Has dreamy, sedative effects
Indoor flowering time of 9-10 weeks

4. Pineapple Skunk
Characteristics of Pineapple Skunk:

Hybrid with slightly indica-dominant effects
Cross between Pineapple, Skunk #1, and Cheese
Bred by Humboldt Seeds
Sweet, pineapple aroma
Delivers mellow, sedative effects
Indoor flowering time of 8 weeks 

5. Hardcore OG
Characteristics of Hardcore OG: 

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Big Bud and DJ Short Blueberry
California-based genetics
Pungent aroma
Brings soothing, sedative effects
High THC
